title: What is outdoor positioning technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: We all are living in a world of technology and used many different technologies to make our life easier and smart. Indoor and outdoor positioning technology is one of that technology that is trending between the peoples due to its advanced functions. Indoor and outdoor positioning technology is used to find the accurate location of the object and things in the inside and the outside environment. While indoor environments are limited in size to rooms and buildings, outdoor positioning capabilities require regional or even global coverage. Positioning and navigation technology is playing an important role in people’s life like when we go to a new place and find our destination then we mostly use GPS technology to find an accurate location. Indoor and outdoor positioning technology is the updated version of GPS technology, now we can easily find the destination in the inside buildings and in the outdoor environment. Outdoor positioning technology used Wifi, Bluetooth and RFID technologies to give the best output to the users. Many providers provide outdoor positioning services at an affordable price.

It is tech to locate your position, obviously. It has existed for a extremely long time. Beyond the simple methods to determine north using the sun, basically two simple things are needed to determine location, a astrolabe and a very accurate clock. The most modern is GPS, but dozens of different systems to determine location have existed, and many of them are still used.
